Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Chordate/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/The 
Oblitercons:



Double Punch, Injector, and Manterror stopped, barely able to see the 
Cybertronian Fire, and barely out of it's scanning range.

"We have to increase our magnification?"

"No!  Beeline!" Double Punch yelled, firing off his cyberbee, Beeline.  

The cyberbee got to an altitude where the Cybertronian Fire's defenses 
couldn't shoot it and scanners couldn't pick it up.  It started going around 
at different angles, taping the ship and taking 'snap shots' that were being 
fed to Double Punch, which were rerouted to Hell Beast's ship.

<Hell Beast, it's Double Punch.  Incoming info on the base.  There are 
several Maximals coming to investigate.  We should hit hard>

(Basically, from the stats of this craft, Hell Beast now knows the visible 
weapons, like lasers, autoguns, ion cannons, and missile launchers)

===

Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer, rifles ready, stood guard in front of Iron 
Raptor and Tavatron.  (Are they caged, or what?  How are they being held 
captive?)

----

The Oblitercons approached Zardus. 

"Where may we find our payment?" Dark One asked.

===

Chordate slowly entered the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire, seeing his 
commander Kluster.  "Kluster, sir, how many of us are left?" he asked, 
getting to a computer console and checking up on systems.
